data.title: EasyPost Joins Forces with Manhattan Associates: A Gold Partnership for a Seamless Shipping Experience
data.meta_description: EasyPost has teamed up with Manhattan Associates to provide a cutting-edge solution to logistic experts worldwide, combining the best in shipping logistics and supply chain management.
data.text:
by Lori Boyer

In a world where efficient shipping is increasingly crucial to business success, EasyPost has teamed up with Manhattan Associates to provide a cutting-edge solution to logistic experts worldwide. This collaboration combines the best of both worlds in shipping logistics and supply chain management.

EasyPost and Manhattan Associates: A Powerful Duo

EasyPost, a leading provider of shipping logistics solutions, has announced its Gold Partnership with Manhattan Associates, a global leader in supply chain commerce solutions. This collaboration aims to provide Manhattan customers with streamlined shipping processes and enhanced operational efficiency. EasyPost's powerful suite of shipping solutions, including its best-of-class Shipping API, offers retailers and brands more reliable, efficient, and cost-effective shipping options.

Manhattan Associates, on the other hand, is a technology leader in supply chain and omnichannel commerce. By converging front-end sales with back-end supply chain execution, Manhattan Associates helps drive both top-line growth and bottom-line profitability for its customers. With this partnership, customers can expect a seamless integration between EasyPost's Shipping API and Manhattan Associates' warehouse management system, leading to a smooth and optimized shipping process.

Benefits of the Partnership

Customers of this partnership can look forward to a variety of benefits, including:

Sub-second shipment processing: EasyPost offers on-premise and cloud-hosted solutions, enabling businesses to unlock sub-second shipment processing and improve productivity.

Real-time data visibility: With EasyPost, Manhattan customers can access a robust plug-in data platform for real-time visibility into their supply chain operations.

Comprehensive suite of shipping logistics solutions: EasyPost's modern solutions, ranging from their API to world-class consulting services, are built to meet today's shipping needs, ensuring customers stay ahead in an increasingly competitive market.

A Word from the Leaders

Sam Hancock, EasyPost VP of growth, expressed his pride in the partnership, stating, "We're honored to be a Manhattan Gold Solutions Partner. The collaboration shows that Manhattan Associates has identified EasyPost as a valuable and trusted resource. Together, we can help our shared customers achieve better business outcomes." Hancock added, "We're excited to help retailers and ecommerce brands reach new heights with the most comprehensive suite of shipping logistics solutions available."
